text: Peter Goodwin Fryer (1928-1999), was a male athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England and won a gold medal in the 4 x 440 yards at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Vancouver, Canada. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:1999 deaths Category:English male sprinters Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in athletics Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for England
title: Peter Fryer (athlete)
